Description: Cornelian thet-girdle amulet inscribed with incised Hieroglyphic text (Book of the Dead spell 156); pierced suspension-ring at the top.
Bibliographic references: Taylor 2010 / Journey through the afterlife: Ancient Egyptian Book of the Dead (no. 11)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2010 4th Nov-2011 6th March, Round Reading Room BM, Book of the Dead 2012 July - September Tokyo, Mori museum, The Book of the Dead: Journey Through the Afterlife 2012 October- November, Fukuoka Museum of Art, The Book of the Dead 2013 May - September, Perth, Western Australian Museum, The Book of the Dead 2022 19 May – 25 Sept, London, British Museum, Feminine Power
